content.raw: I agree with all your points regarding collision detection. But we should keep in mind that there are many other use cases for a mathematical representation of a shape. Just like we use the `Box` and `Frustum` classes right now for a variety of logical tasks, `Sphere` and `Cylinder` classes could be convenient for things outside of physics, like visualizations, sensors and just general 3D geometry logic.
